author: Josh Zumbrun, David Harrison
title: World Bank, IMF Push to Consolidate Patchwork Approach to Coronavirus Crisis - The Wall Street Journal
description: World Bank, IMF Push to Consolidate Patchwork Approach to Coronavirus Crisis The Wall Street Journal 'Force of nature' Georgieva leads IMF through coronavirus storm Reuters 'Make or break': IMF, World Bank to chart virus fight this week Aljazeera.com A Rally …
content:
In times of crisis, the worlds economic policy makers have often gathered at G-20 summits and at the semiannual meetings of the International Monetary Fund and World Bank to formulate global rescues. But not this time.
No officials will travel to Washington,… [+278 chars]
